title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8042.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8042.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 88. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 88 between the Schoharie-Schenectady
county line and Thruway exit 25A in the Towns of Duanesburgh, Princetown and

Rotterdam. (b) IR 890. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of IR 890 between Thruway exit 26 and the

Schenectady-Albany county line in the City of Schenectady and Town of

Rotterdam. (c) Route 5. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 5 between the City of Schenectady and
the Schenectady-Albany county line in the Town of Niskayuna. (d) IR 90. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of IR 90 between the Montgomery-Schenectady county line and the

Schenectady-Albany county line in the Town of Rotterdam. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8042.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
